Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-45779 affecting package grub2 for versions less than 2.06-15
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-45779 affecting package grub2 for versions less than 2.06-15. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package grub2 is earlier than 2.06-15, affected by CVE-2024-45779
